channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This abandoned van makes loud beeping sounds all night, 9th February
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned for over 5 months. For the second night in a row it's making very loud beeping sounds that are audible on the whole street. It's most probably due to some battery issue or sensor failure. It's impossible to sleep like this.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Johns Park, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Yet against several lime bikes are blocking the disabled bay! Sort it out.

item.title: Poor road condition, 9th February
item.description:
Perry rise from bell green to priestfield road is in a very poor condition especially the bus stop needs to be fixed and resurfaced ASAP before someone has a serious incident

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Rise, Perry Vale, Greater London

item.title: Parking on pavement, 9th February
item.description:
If its not parked on the pavement within the estate its parked in the car park with tape covering its numberplate to avoid a ticket. Someone needs to be done about this ASAP if not will continue to report weekly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paradise Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus Stop needed on Brookehowse Road towards Downham, 9th February
item.description:
Bus stop needed on Brookehowse Road towards Downham. When the 336 bus stopped doing a Hail & Ride down this road by TFL’s decision in December 2024, they didn’t put a stop here towards Downham where several elderly and regular bus passengers used to board and alight. I would like to see a bus stop here as the distance between the stop by Bellingham Station and the next one at Southend Lane is well over 600 metres and is too far, there is a new stop opposite to go towards Catford which had a bus stop bay installed at the time and there is ample room to put one opposite but they haven’t done so leading to several elderly passengers deciding to not use the 336 bus now. Put a stop there and you get the passengers back. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookehowse Road, Southend, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Deep and Dangerous Potholes, 9th February
item.description:
Several Deep and Dangerous Potholes have the capability to cause injury to fellow bus passengers like myself who regularly use the 336 bus when the bus hits these potholes unintentionally. They need fixing ASAP. I can put both my fists into the holes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown, Downham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A council bin which has been there for 25 years suddenly removed, 9th February
item.description:
The Bin is on the only a main southern route to Plumcroft Scool. Also nearby Bench is used by many to view the sites of London. Bring back the Bin!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plum Lane, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Albany street - temp lights not working, 9th February
item.description:
Failure to attend and fix. Caused issues ever since put up. Caused danger to human safety, as cars are running red lights. Disturbed the peace in a residential conservation area. Caused major traffic 24/7.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Albany Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
